data.title: Contact Health Canada
data.meta_description: Contact information for enquiries about Health Canada, its goals, ministers, organizational structure and activities
data.text:
General Inquiries

You can contact Health Canada for general enquiries in any one of the following ways:

By Mail:

Health Canada

Address Locator 1801B

Ottawa, Ontario

K1A 0K9

Email: hcinfo.infosc@canada.ca

Telephone: 613-957-2991

Toll free: 1-866-225-0709

Facsimile: 613-941-5366

Teletypewriter: 1-800-465-7735 (Service Canada)

For individuals seeking information about cannabis for medical purposes only, contact Health Canada. Call toll-free at 1-866-337-7705 or email omc-bcm@hc-sc.gc.ca.

Contact Resources

For a quicker response, select one of the categories below to send your comments and suggestions to the right area.

Departmental Contacts

Contact the Minister of Health by email at hcminister.ministresc@hc-sc.gc.ca

Contact the Minister of Mental Health and Addictions and Associate Minister of Health by email at mhaminister.ministresmd@hc-sc.gc.ca

Contact the Deputy Minister of Health

Contact an employee by searching the Government of Canada Employee Directory to find their telephone and fax numbers, or mailing address.
